decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title(s): Site Location Plan 20B-SD-PF PS01-2, Existing Site Block Plan 20B-SD-PF PS02-2, Proposed Site Block Plan 20B-SD-PF PS03-2, Existing First Floor Plan 20B-SD-PF PS04-2, Existing Roof Plan 20B-SD-PF PS05-2, Existing Rear Elevation 20B-SD-PF PS06-2, Existing Side Elevation 20B-SD-PF PS07-2, Existing Side Elevation 20B-SD-PF PS08-2, Existing Section 20B-SD-PF PS09-2, Existing Section 20B-SD-PF PS10-2, Existing Section 20B-SD-PF PS11-2, Proposed First Floor Plan 20B-SD-PF PS12-2a, Proposed Roof Plan 20B-SD-PF PS13-2a, Proposed Rear Elevation 20B-SD-PF PS14-2a, Proposed Side Elevation 20B-SD-PF PS15-2, Proposed Section 20B-SD-PF PS16-2a, Proposed Section 20B-SD-PF PS17-2a, Proposed Section 20B-SD-PF PS18-2a, Proposed Section 20B-SD-PF PS19-2a, Design and Access Statement December 2023.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).

| Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any subsequent amendment, revision or new Order) no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the approved development.

Reason: To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), Policies D1 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).

| Other than the balconies identified in the approved drawings listed under condition 2, no part of the roof shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy (2012).
site_name: 20 Flat B First Floor  20 Flat C
description: First floor rear extension with glass balustrade to 20 Flat B; installation of timber screen/fence between 20 Flat B and 20 Flat C (Joint Application)
